actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-1405.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept 94-1217.

official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of the publication entitled "Summary of Veterans Legislation Reported, Ninety-fourth Congress.

summary.text: Directs that there be printed for the use of the Committee on Veterans' Affairs of the House of Representatives 56,100 copies of "Summary of Veterans' Legislation Reported, Ninety-fourth Congress" with an additional 44,200 copies for use by Members of the House, and 20,000 copies of a similar publication, with emphasis upon matters relating to veterans' affairs considered by the Senate or by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs of the Senate, for the use of the Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of the publication entitled "Summary of Veterans Legislation Reported, Ninety-fourth Congress.
